definition[0]: to stop sleeping, or to make someone stop sleeping
example[0]: When she woke, the sun was streaming through the windows.
example[1]: Try not to wake the baby.
example[2]: Nancy woke to the sound of birds outside her window  (=she heard birds singing when she woke).
definition[1]: the time before or after a funeral when friends and relatives meet to remember the dead person
definition[2]: the track made behind a boat as it moves through the water
